transcript: the opportunity is in the uncertainty and so as long as you can Embrace that which is why you have to have some tolerance for risk as an entrepreneur because you have to pay down your tax of ignorance which we all have to pay down every single day for not knowing the things we should know and the only way you pay down that tax is that you test and you iterate and so you just want to get as many knows out of the way as many failures out of the way because you're not actually failing you made progress it wasn't yes or no did it work or not it's how well did it work
